programmes.show_description: 4/8. Stephen's anxiety begins to boil over, and Diana makes a shocking discovery. Contains strong language and scenes of a sexual nature.
5/8. Lucy and Pippa learn something unsettling from a school-wide email. Contains very strong language.
1/6. Nina finds herself with a tough decision to make while working away on the Isle of Wight. Contains some strong language and adult humour.
2/6. Back in Glasgow, a day full of surprises leaves Nina reeling. Contains some strong language and adult humour.
3/6. Lee's invite to an open mic night gives Nina the chance to find out where she stands. Contains some strong language and adult humour.
Who was behind the infamous gunpoint robbery of Kim Kardashian? Those close to the case reveal details about the crime for the first time. Contains very strong language.

A round-up of the day's news.
Studious Peter Parker accidentally gains superpowers, but it takes a tragedy to teach him how to be a hero and the price of keeping secrets. Contains scenes of moderate violence. [2002]
...Mont-Spelling Bee Australia. 7/8. Greg Larsen, Zoe Coombs Marr, Tony Armstrong and Tom Ballard are joined by sporting legends and asked to spell their feelings.
...Mont-Spelling Bee Australia. 8/8. The stakes are high as the panel compete to be the ultimate spelling champion. Contains some strong language.
11/12. In the penultimate episode, both Faithful and Traitor lie for their lives in an attempt to get to the grand final. Contains some strong language.
12/12. Twenty-four players arrived at Slane Castle, but a handful remain. The final mission has another 10,000 euros at stake, but who will claim it? Contains some strong language.
2/7. Motoring news and views. The team try to find the perfect car for 17-year-olds, negotiating insurance companies, accident repairs and a music festival car park.
3/7. Motoring news and views. Clarkson, Hammond and May confront the credit crunch as they search for three sensibly priced small cars that will not make their owners miserable.

programmes.show_description: 1/2. Tir Dhondy investigates Las Vegas: from the big spenders to life beyond the bright lights. Contains some upsetting scenes and flashing images.

programmes.show_name: Sin City: The Real Las Vegas

1/14. Kidnapped by his oldest foe, the Doctor is forced on an impossible mission - to a place even the Daleks are too terrified to enter...
2/14. Sci-fi drama. An unmanned spaceship hurtles towards certain destruction. Only the Doctor can save it, along with its impossible cargo... of dinosaurs!
7/7. When Stacey travels to Essex to sort out the situation with Gavin, things do not go to plan. In Barry, an unexpected event throws everyone into a panic.
5/6. Agnes mistakenly believes that her family are planning to put her in a nursing home. Contains some strong language.
6/6. Agnes's attempts to build bridges come to an abrupt halt when Maria goes into labour. Contains some strong language.
1/6. Gaz runs naked through the streets of Runcorn, and Louise's psychic powers inspire Jonny to make an unusual career move. Contains some strong language and adult humour.
2/6. Louise copes with a desperate new boyfriend, Gaz and Donna abuse Janet's trifle, and Jonny finds an unusual way to spend his scratchcard winnings. Contains adult humour.
3/6. Janet rediscovers a love letter from her gorgeous ex, Flo asks Donna to move out so she can set up a massage parlour, and Louise experiments with gay sex. Contains adult humour.
4/6. Donna is worried that Jonny's 'illness' is just an excuse to avoid her, Janet runs into an old flame, and Louise buys a puppy. Contains adult humour.
